trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_SEQ_00<tab>Kaizan is looking for a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of true grit.
TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_TODO_00<tab>Use large burlap sacks to capture weakened sea serpents.
TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the weakened sea serpents to Kaizan.
TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_KAIZAN_000_000<tab>Ha! You look to be a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of great strength and courage, besides! How would you like to do me a favor?
TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_KAIZAN_000_001<tab>To the west of Shoal Rock are sea serpents. I need for you to weaken three and bring them back to me in these sacks.

TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_KAIZAN_000_002<tab>You are a brave <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>─far braver than the spineless cowards what inhabit this island. To think they call themselves pirates when a little serpent venom is enough to scare them. Ha! What a sorry lot!
TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_KAIZAN_000_003<tab>To the west of Shoal Rock are some sea serpents. I need you to weaken three, put them in the burlap sacks I gave you, and deliver them to me.
TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_KAIZAN_000_010<tab>Have you brought me my sea serpents?

TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_KAIZAN_000_011<tab>Well, color me impressed! You actually managed to capture three! While that is the number I asked for, they are extremely vicious creatures, and I expected you would only be able to return with one.
TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_KAIZAN_000_012<tab>I am also glad to see you also took care not to kill them. Sea serpent steak is incredibly tasty but only if prepared fresh.
TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_KAIZAN_000_013<tab>Before I get to grilling these buggers, however, I must milk them for their venom. We use it to spike the drinks of Confederate traitors.
TEXT_STMBDZ208_02680_KAIZAN_000_014<tab>Nine out of ten times they will die, but the lucky survivors─like me─are given the chance to redeem themselves.
